code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{NavLink,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState('/');const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const sections=document.querySelectorAll('section');const scrollPos=window.scrollY+window.innerHeight/2;sections.forEach(section=>{const top=section.offsetTop;const height=section.offsetHeight;const id=section.getAttribute('id');if(scrollPos>=top&&scrollPos<top+height){setActiveSection(id);}});};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);};},[]);useEffect(()=>{setActiveSection(location.pathname==='/'?'about':location.pathname.slice(1));},[location]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",className:"nav-link ".concat(activeSection==='about'?'active':''),children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#skills-section",className:"nav-link ".concat(activeSection==='skills-section'?'active':''),children:"Skills"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#projects-section",className:"nav-link ".concat(activeSection==='projects-section'?'active':''),children:"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#experience-section",className:"nav-link ".concat(activeSection==='experience-section'?'active':''),children:"Experience"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#values-section",className:"nav-link ".concat(activeSection==='values-section'?'active':''),children:"Values"})})]})});};export default Navbar;
